lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony says he was momentarily "shocked" when he felt someone grasping at his thigh as he stood near the top of the key in the final minute of the New York Kicks' game against the New Orleans Pelicans on Monday night.

headline.print_headline: Knicks' Carmelo Anthony 'Shocked' by Child's Hug During Game
headline.main: Knicks' Carmelo Anthony 'Shocked' by Child's Hug During Game

snippet: Carmelo Anthony says he was momentarily "shocked" when he felt someone grasping at his thigh as he stood near the top of the key in the final minute of the New York Kicks' game against the New Orleans Pelicans on Monday night....
